title: Graduate Outreach Director
content: Connect with the graduate body (students and professors) and encourage graduate students at UF to become involved in SHPE and in other graduate student organizations (GSOs).
This position includes planning for the Graduate Meet & Greet (GSO Fair) and other graduate involvement opportunities.

title: Research Director
content: Help members obtain research opportunities and provide a space for those that have already participated in research to showcase their projects.
This position includes planning for the SHPE Research Symposium, SHPEitos-in-Research program, and various research info sessions.

title: Networking Director
content: Work closely with the Graduate Coordinator to plan and manage all of the events pertaining to the Graduate Cabinet.
This position includes providing creative insight and ideas on how to maximize the impact and reach of all of the cabinetâ€™s events.

title: Newsletter Director
content: Craft a biweekly graduate-focused newsletter with information regarding research opportunities, graduate cabinet events, deadlines and more.
This position includes coordinating with the Secretary Cabinet to optimize newsletter content and delivery.
